title: Citi 2017 Investor Day Presentation Materials
summary: The presentation materials and webcast link for Citi's 2017 Investor Day will be available at approximately 7:00 a.m. (EDT) on Tuesday, July 25 at www.citi.com/investorday.
tag-2: The presentation materials and webcast link for Citi's 2017 Investor Day will be available at approximately 7:00 a.m. (EDT) on Tuesday, July 25 at www.citi.com/investorday.
tag-3: Citi will hold an Investor Day in New York City on Tuesday, July 25, 2017. CEO Michael Corbat and members of Citi's senior leadership team will deliver presentations and participate in a question and answer session. The event will begin at 8:45 a.m. (EDT) and is expected to conclude by approximately 3:00 p.m. (EDT). Attendance in person is by invitation only.
tag-4: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
